Question: pmdtechnologies ag CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
pmdtechnologies ag

Product 1

- 3D ToF Development Kit flexx2
- Powerful 3D depth sensing
- Enables machines to see and understand the world
- Specially developed Time-of-Flight (ToF) imagers for smartphones
- Natural HMI & enhanced safety features for cars
- Ubiquitous sensing and computing for the fourth industrial revolution
